Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

DC CODE ยง 29-404.11

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Except as otherwise provided in the articles of incorporation or bylaws, a member of a membership corporation shall not transfer a membership or any right arising therefrom.

If the right to transfer a membership has been provided, a restriction on that right shall not be binding with respect to a member holding a membership issued before the adoption of the restriction unless the restriction is approved by the affected member.
